ARABIC: لَكُمْ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٌ كَثِيرَةٌ مِّنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There will be many fruits in it for you to eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You will have fruits in abundance there to eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Herein you will have abundant fruits of which you will eat.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You will have abundant fruits therein to consume".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “For you are many fruits in it, for you to eat therefrom.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Therein for you will be fruits in plenty, of which you will eat (as you desire).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: For you therein are many fruits of which you shall eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Therein you have abundant fruits, whereof you may eat.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Therein for you is fruit in plenty whence to eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and there is abundant fruit in it for you to eat."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: For you therein will be fruits in plenty whereof ye will eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There are abundant fruits for you in it, from which you will eat.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Ye shall have therein abundance of fruit, from which ye shall have satisfaction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Therein for you will be fruits in plenty, of which you will eat (as you desire).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You shall have therein abundant fruit to eat'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Therein you will have abundant fruit, from which you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: For you therein is much fruit from which you will eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:73] Therein are abundant fruits for you, from which, that is, parts of which, you will eat’, for whatever is eaten is [immediately] replaced [with more of the same].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Therein) in the Garden (for you is fruit) different kinds of fruit (in plenty whence to eat.
